title: Data: Fisheries (CALCOFI)
text: data used two CALCOFI display functions (calcofi_map() & calcofi_plot()) found calcofi-analysis folder within marinebon GitHub account.

title: Data: Oceanography (ERDDAP)
text: ERDDAP (Environmental Research Division Data Access Portal) data sourced ERDDAP server using rerddap R library.

title: Data: Oceanography (ERDDAP)
text: data ERDDAP server updated regularly provides opportunity interactive figures using ERDDAP data updated regularly well. first step process update relevant tables, Channel Islands Marine Sanctuary (CINMS) located : https://github.com/marinebon/cinms/tree/master/data/oceano. tables, saved csv format, updated monthly via GitHub Actions using update_oceano.yml workflow. workflow turn calls R script update_oceano-data.R, uses calculate_statistics() calculate_SST_anomaly functions onmsR package update relevant csv files.

title: Data: Oceanography (ERDDAP)
text: data tables updated, next step update figures draw upon tables. done rerendering modal windows (R Markdown files) contain figures. also occurs monthly basis via GitHub Actions using update_oceano.yml workflow. workflow calls R script render_oceano-modals.R, calls onmsR function render_all_rmd() update relevant modal windows.

title: Data: Rocky intertidal (MARINe)
text: MARINe (Multi-Agency Rocky Intertidal Network) data publicly available (though available upon request). consequence, interactive figures containing MARINe data can generated users given data access. MARINe-related onmsR functions assume MARINe data available locally, local access provided via application Google Drive File Stream. Google Drive File Stream turn connects non-public Google Drive contains MARINe data.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ben Best. Author, maintainer. Jai Ranganathan. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Best B, Ranganathan J (2025). onmsR: Office National Marine Sanctuaries functions dataset-specific wrangling plotting R. R package version 0.2.4, https://noaa-onms.github.io/onmsR.

title: Produces plots of CALCOFI data — calcofi_plot
code: calcofi_plot(   csv,   x_fld = "year",   y_fld = "avg_larvae_count_per_volume_sampled",   y_trans = "log(y + 1)",   x_lab = "Year",   y_lab = "ln(mean abundance + 1)",   title = NULL,   yrs_recent = 5,   interactive = T,   in_loop = F )

title: Produces plots of CALCOFI data — calcofi_plot
text: csv CALCOFI time series data, csv format, plotted. x_fld column time series data used x-axis plot. y_fld column time series data used y-axis plot. y_trans transformation performed data used y-axis. x_lab label x-axis plot. y_lab label y-axis plot. title label title plot. yrs_recent number recent years shaded plot. interactive Boolean variable indicating whether plot interactive . in_loop Boolean variable indicating whether error condition exists.

title: Produces plots of CALCOFI data — calcofi_plot
text: output plot time series data.

title: Produces plots of CALCOFI data — calcofi_plot
Calculate SST anomaly — calculate_SST_anomaly
text: function calculates SST anomaly every month SST data writes csv file later used produce SST anomaly figure. approach used based Reed et al. 2016, Nature Communications. Using first 15 full years data SST data set (2003-2017), average SST value generated every month year. average SST value appropriate month subtracted every value SST dataset.

title: Calculate SST anomaly — calculate_SST_anomaly
text: sanct NMS sanctuary, value "cinms" currently anything.

title: Calculate SST anomaly — calculate_SST_anomaly

what: Generate statistics for any missing months for NMS Sanctuary — calculate_statistics
title: Generate statistics for any missing months for NMS Sanctuary — calculate_statistics
text: purpose function update csv files hold history satellite-derived metrics sanctuary. csv files used basis graphs plot metric values time. Currently, two metrics kept track csv files: sea surface temperature chlorophyll. function intended run month github actions, adding latest month's data intended csv file - additionally filling data holes crept , previous months. reason data holes found NOAA servers satellite data kept rather temperamental often . , possible given moment github actions attempting run function, server - meaning month's run function, data. hope future months, server fill data holes.

what: Make Sanctuary sites for mapping from raw rocky intertidal (MARINe) data file — make_rocky_sites
title: Make Sanctuary sites for mapping from raw rocky intertidal (MARINe) data file — make_rocky_sites
text: Make Sanctuary sites mapping raw rocky intertidal (MARINe) data file

title: Make Sanctuary sites for mapping from raw rocky intertidal (MARINe) data file — make_rocky_sites
code: make_rocky_sites(   raw_csv,   nms_ply = NULL,   site_regions = NULL,   raw_source = c("csv", "erddap") )

title: Make Sanctuary sites for mapping from raw rocky intertidal (MARINe) data file — make_rocky_sites
text: raw_csv raw data file containing fields: marine_site_name, longitude, latitude. nms_ply optional National Marine Sanctuary polygon, e.g. get_nms_polygons("ocnms") spatially filter raw_csv within 0.01 decimal degrees (≈ 1.11 km). Usually include either parameter nms_ply site_regions select sites given sanctuary. site_regions optional lookup table containing fields region rgn site site filter site raw_csv append rgn field. Usually include either parameter nms_ply site_regions select sites given sanctuary. raw_source either "csv" (default) "erddap" handling file format differences

title: Make Sanctuary sites for mapping from raw rocky intertidal (MARINe) data file — make_rocky_sites
text: sites data frame 59 rows 4 variables: nms National Marine Sanctuary code, e.g. CINMS MBNMS rgn region site site

title: Extract ERDDAP statistics from polygon by year-month — ply2erddap
text: sanctuary_code sanctuary code based prefix Sanctuary GIS files, e.g. "cinms" Channel Islands Marine Sanctuary erddap_id dataset ID ERDDAP dataset (see coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap), e.g. "jplMURSST41mday" Multi-scale Ultra-high Resolution SST Analysis erddap_fld variable ERDDAP dataset extract, e.g. "sst" year 4-digit year. month integer month (1-12). stats statistics calculated.

title: Rocky intertidal species counts — rocky_counts
text: table MARINe intertidal average species counts summarized annually across sanctuaries, clusters (including ""), sites (including ""), sp_method (including "") species code sp_code. data sp_target (target_assemblage) "sea_star".

title: Rocky intertidal species counts — rocky_counts
text: simple features tibble : nms National Marine Sanctuary acronym, e.g. CINMS cluster grouping sites, e.g. Santa Cruz Island site MARINe site date annual date YYYY-06-15 sp_method MARINe method used sampling plot: IP = Irregular Plot; BT25 = Band Transect 2m x 5m; GSES = General search entire site; TS30 = Timed Search 30 Minute. sp_code MARINe species code count average count

title: Rocky intertidal species counts — rocky_counts
text: https://marine.ucsc.edu/sites/sites-region/index.html

Plot time series of rocky intertidal monitoring data — rocky_tsplot
text: data Either rocky_cover rocky_counts. nms National Marine Sanctuary code, e.g. "CINMS", sanctuaries. sp_code species code interest referenced rocky_cover rocky_counts described rocky_species. sp_name species name used title plot. sp_filter filter value apply rocky_cover sp_target rocky_counts sp_method. Defaults "".

title: Plot time series of rocky intertidal monitoring data — rocky_tsplot
text: function returns dygraph object plotted time series data.
